long_description:
As one of the most visited, filmed and photographer cities in the world, New York is easily recognizable. If you live here or have visited often, you might be interested in seeing Gotham City from different angles. Have you tried taking to sea? You don’t have to go far, a few laps around New York City Harbor will do.

 

We know that the guests of the Royalton New York Hotel extraordinary activities, so we’ve chosen our favorite cruise, yacht and sailboat experiences.

 

Yacht Manhattan by Classic Harbor Line

What better way to cruise around New York Harbor than on a yacht? And not just any yacht, but a classic one inspired by the commuter yachts of the 20s which were only accessible to the rich, famous and powerful. Our top suggestions are the AIANY Around Manhattan Architecture Tour and the Champagne Sunset Cruise.

 

Bateaux Dinner Cruises

While on a cruise around New York, you don’t want to miss the impressive skyline, even when you’re sitting down for a meal. Nobody wants to worry about paying for a cruise and having to fight for the window table. With Bateaux Dinner Cruises, this won’t be you. The experience comes with an all-glass cruise, live music and scrumptious food.  

 

Wine Tasting Sail aboard the Shearwater

Take wine tasting to a new level by boarding a sailboat and kicking back for an afternoon in the sun. You’ll be accompanied by sommeliers who’ll pair the wine with cheese and charcuterie. This sailboat is casual, laid back and full of exquisite drinks and food. Just what we need after a long week.  

 

Fireworks Dinner Cruises in New York

There are many ways to celebrate special occasions, such as Pride Week, Independence Day or New Year’s Eve. Nothing beats seeing Manhattan’s skyline illuminated by fireworks while having a buffet dinner, live music and hours of sailing across New York Harbor.

 

Follow our blog to stay up-to-date with the latest news and happenings in New York City. When you’re ready, take a look at our special offers and book your room at the Royalton New York Hotel.
